jsCow.res.components.textfield.name: jsCow.res.components.textfield
jsCow.res.components.textfield.description:
jsCow textfield component is a reusable component used in client side jsCow applications. 
A textfield is a component, which enables users to interact with an application.
jsCow.res.components.textfield.author: Mario Linz <jscow@gmx.de>
jsCow.res.components.textfield.type: Class Provides the main class of the component
